location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 83: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to J Malcolm, Armenian Merchant, Bushire

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell refers to his earlier letter to Malcolm, no. 402, dated 24 December 1849, and states that Malcolm may find answers to his questions in the British and Russian commercial treaties that were concluded with Persia. Hennell informs Malcolm that copies of both of these treaties can be found in the Residency's archives.
